laboratory_examinations.findings: Slightly elevated to 293 initially and later 8400.

Intrahepatic biliary dilatation noted. CBD measures 9 mm proximally, tapering distally to 4 mm. Gallbladder is distended with a thickened and edematous wall; contains sludge. No definite gallstone seen.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Intrahepatic biliary dilatation and gallbladder thickening similar to prior MR.
